Page 2 of 2 
 THE  FUNDS  VESTING IN THE  PRESIDENT (TRAN SFER) ACT, 1973  
ACT  NO. LX OF  1973  
[11th August, 1973] 
An Act to provide for the administration of certain Funds vesting in the President 
WHERE AS it is expedient to provide  for the admin istration of certain Funds  vesting  in the 
President and for matters connected therewith;  
It is hereby enacted as follows:— 
1. Short title and comme ncement.⸻(1) This Act may be called the Funds Vesting in the 
President (Transfer) Act, 1973.  
(2) It shall come into force at once. 
2. Vesting of Funds in Federal Government and their utilisation. ⸻(1) Notwith standing  
anything contained in any other law or instrument, the Funds  specified in the  Schedule, together 
with income and profits accruing thereon, shall vest in the Federal Gov ernment. 
(2) The amounts  in the aforesaid Funds  shall be utilised for the purposes for which they 
were raised or for purposes as simil ar thereto as the circumst ances may permit. 
THE SCHEDU LE 
[See section 2 (1)]  
1. President’s Relief Fund instituted in 1972.  
2. President’s Palestine  and Arab Relief Fund. 
3. Tazeenul Qu ran Fund. 
4. Presidents’ Welfare Fund.

   RGN Date: 0 8-05-2024
